api_call:
curl --request POST \
  --url 'http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-create' \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"Attendees":[{"ExternalUserId":"string","Capabilities":{"Audio":"SendReceive","Video":"SendReceive","Content":"SendReceive"}}]}'
description: Creates up to 100 attendees for an active Amazon Chime SDK meeting. For more information about the Amazon Chime SDK, see Using the Amazon Chime SDK in the Amazon Chime Developer Guide.
api_description: The Amazon Chime SDK meetings APIs in this section allow software developers to create Amazon Chime SDK meetings, set the AWS Regions for meetings, create and manage users, and send and receive meeting notifications. For more information about the meeting APIs, see Amazon Chime SDK meetings.

api_call:
OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient();

MediaType mediaType = MediaType.parse("application/json");
RequestBody body = RequestBody.create(mediaType, "{\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}]}");
Request request = new Request.Builder()
  .url("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-create")
  .post(body)
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .addHeader("content-type", "application/json")
  .build();

Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

best_instruction.candidate: How do I add up to 100 attendees to my currently ongoing Amazon Chime SDK meeting using the API?

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

payload = "{\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}]}"

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))
description: Creates up to 100 attendees for an active Amazon Chime SDK meeting. For more information about the Amazon Chime SDK, see Using the Amazon Chime SDK in the Amazon Chime Developer Guide.

best_instruction.candidate: How do I add up to 100 attendees to an existing Amazon Chime SDK meeting using the Amazon Chime SDK Meetings API?

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-create"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}]}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

best_instruction.candidate: How do I add up to 100 attendees to an ongoing Amazon Chime SDK meeting? (Using the Amazon Chime SDK Meetings API)

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-create")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-create",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
  "content-type": "application/json"
]
let parameters = ["Attendees": [
    [
      "ExternalUserId": "string",
      "Capabilities": [
        "Audio": "SendReceive",
        "Video": "SendReceive",
        "Content": "SendReceive"
      ]
    ]
  ]] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-create")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers
request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

api_call:
curl --request PUT \
  --url 'http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/capabilities?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-update-except' \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"ExcludedAttendeeIds":[{"AttendeeId":"string"}],"Capabilities":{"Audio":"SendReceive","Video":"SendReceive","Content":"SendReceive"}}'
description:
Updates AttendeeCapabilities except the capabilities listed in an ExcludedAttendeeIds table.

You use the capabilities with a set of values that control what the capabilities can do, such as SendReceive data. For more information about those values, see .

When using capabilities, be aware of these corner cases:

  • You can't set content capabilities to SendReceive or Receive unless you also set video capabilities to SendReceive or Receive. If you don't set the video capability to receive, the response will contain an HTTP 400 Bad Request status code. However, you can set your video capability to receive and you set your content capability to not receive.

  • When you change an audio capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee left their microphone unmuted, audio will flow from the attendee to the other meeting participants.

  • When you change a video or content capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee turned on their video or content streams, remote attendees can receive those streams, but only after media renegotiation between the client and the Amazon Chime back-end server.

best_instruction.candidate: Please give an example of how to use the endpoint "BatchUpdateAttendeeCapabilitiesExcept" from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings to update the capabilities of specific attendees, excluding those listed in a table.

api_call:
OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient();

MediaType mediaType = MediaType.parse("application/json");
RequestBody body = RequestBody.create(mediaType, "{\"ExcludedAttendeeIds\":[{\"AttendeeId\":\"string\"}],\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}");
Request request = new Request.Builder()
  .url("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/capabilities?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-update-except")
  .put(body)
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .addHeader("content-type", "application/json")
  .build();

Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

Updates AttendeeCapabilities except the capabilities listed in an ExcludedAttendeeIds table.

You use the capabilities with a set of values that control what the capabilities can do, such as SendReceive data. For more information about those values, see .

When using capabilities, be aware of these corner cases:

  • You can't set content capabilities to SendReceive or Receive unless you also set video capabilities to SendReceive or Receive. If you don't set the video capability to receive, the response will contain an HTTP 400 Bad Request status code. However, you can set your video capability to receive and you set your content capability to not receive.

  • When you change an audio capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee left their microphone unmuted, audio will flow from the attendee to the other meeting participants.

  • When you change a video or content capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee turned on their video or content streams, remote attendees can receive those streams, but only after media renegotiation between the client and the Amazon Chime back-end server.

best_instruction.candidate: Please give me an example of how to update the attendee capabilities, excluding those listed in a table, using the endpoint BatchUpdateAttendeeCapabilitiesExcept from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings.

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

payload = "{\"ExcludedAttendeeIds\":[{\"AttendeeId\":\"string\"}],\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}"

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PUT", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/capabilities?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

best_instruction.candidate: Please give an example of how to use the endpoint BatchUpdateAttendeeCapabilitiesExcept from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings to update the capabilities of certain attendees, while excluding others.

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/capabilities?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-update-except"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"ExcludedAttendeeIds\":[{\"AttendeeId\":\"string\"}],\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("PUT", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

best_instruction.candidate: Please give me an example of how to update the attendee capabilities, except for those listed in an "ExcludedAttendeeIds" table, using the endpoint BatchUpdateAttendeeCapabilitiesExcept from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings.

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/capabilities?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-update-except")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Put.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"ExcludedAttendeeIds\":[{\"AttendeeId\":\"string\"}],\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

best_instruction.candidate: Please give an example of how to update attendee capabilities except for those listed in a table using the endpoint BatchUpdateAttendeeCapabilitiesExcept from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings.

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/capabilities?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-update-except",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"ExcludedAttendeeIds\":[{\"AttendeeId\":\"string\"}],\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",

  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
  "content-type": "application/json"
]
let parameters = [
  "ExcludedAttendeeIds": [["AttendeeId": "string"]],
  "Capabilities": [
    "Audio": "SendReceive",
    "Video": "SendReceive",
    "Content": "SendReceive"
  ]
] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/capabilities?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=batch-update-except")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "PUT"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers
request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

  --header 'X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"ExternalUserId":"pa$$word","Capabilities":{"Audio":"SendReceive","Video":"SendReceive","Content":"SendReceive"}}'

api_call:
OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient();

MediaType mediaType = MediaType.parse("application/json");
RequestBody body = RequestBody.create(mediaType, "{\"ExternalUserId\":\"pa$$word\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}");
Request request = new Request.Builder()
  .url("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees")
  .post(body)
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .addHeader("content-type", "application/json")
  .build();

Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

payload = "{\"ExternalUserId\":\"pa$$word\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}"

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"ExternalUserId\":\"pa$$word\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"ExternalUserId\":\"pa$$word\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"ExternalUserId\":\"pa$$word\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

] as [String : Any]

                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers
request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in

})

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("GET", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?next-token=SOME_STRING_VALUE&max-results=SOME_INTEGER_VALUE&MaxResults=SOME_STRING_VALUE&NextToken=SOME_STRING_VALUE", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?next-token=SOME_STRING_VALUE&max-results=SOME_INTEGER_VALUE&MaxResults=SOME_STRING_VALUE&NextToken=SOME_STRING_VALUE"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?next-token=SOME_STRING_VALUE&max-results=SOME_INTEGER_VALUE&MaxResults=SOME_STRING_VALUE&NextToken=SOME_STRING_VALUE")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?next-token=SOME_STRING_VALUE&max-results=SOME_INTEGER_VALUE&MaxResults=SOME_STRING_VALUE&NextToken=SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

api_call:
import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
]

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees?next-token=SOME_STRING_VALUE&max-results=SOME_INTEGER_VALUE&MaxResults=SOME_STRING_VALUE&NextToken=SOME_STRING_VALUE")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "GET"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

Request request = new Request.Builder()
  .url("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings")
  .post(body)
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")

  .addHeader("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .addHeader("content-type", "application/json")
  .build();

Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

best_instruction.candidate: How do I create a new Amazon Chime SDK meeting in my preferred media region using the Amazon Chime SDK Meetings API?

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

payload = "{\"ClientRequestToken\":\"pa$$word\",\"MediaRegion\":\"string\",\"MeetingHostId\":\"pa$$word\",\"ExternalMeetingId\":\"pa$$word\",\"NotificationsConfiguration\":{\"LambdaFunctionArn\":\"string\",\"SnsTopicArn\":\"string\",\"SqsQueueArn\":\"string\"},\"MeetingFeatures\":{\"Audio\":{\"EchoReduction\":\"AVAILABLE\"}},\"PrimaryMeetingId\":\"string\",\"TenantIds\":[\"string\"],\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}"

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"ClientRequestToken\":\"pa$$word\",\"MediaRegion\":\"string\",\"MeetingHostId\":\"pa$$word\",\"ExternalMeetingId\":\"pa$$word\",\"NotificationsConfiguration\":{\"LambdaFunctionArn\":\"string\",\"SnsTopicArn\":\"string\",\"SqsQueueArn\":\"string\"},\"MeetingFeatures\":{\"Audio\":{\"EchoReduction\":\"AVAILABLE\"}},\"PrimaryMeetingId\":\"string\",\"TenantIds\":[\"string\"],\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"ClientRequestToken\":\"pa$$word\",\"MediaRegion\":\"string\",\"MeetingHostId\":\"pa$$word\",\"ExternalMeetingId\":\"pa$$word\",\"NotificationsConfiguration\":{\"LambdaFunctionArn\":\"string\",\"SnsTopicArn\":\"string\",\"SqsQueueArn\":\"string\"},\"MeetingFeatures\":{\"Audio\":{\"EchoReduction\":\"AVAILABLE\"}},\"PrimaryMeetingId\":\"string\",\"TenantIds\":[\"string\"],\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"ClientRequestToken\":\"pa$$word\",\"MediaRegion\":\"string\",\"MeetingHostId\":\"pa$$word\",\"ExternalMeetingId\":\"pa$$word\",\"NotificationsConfiguration\":{\"LambdaFunctionArn\":\"string\",\"SnsTopicArn\":\"string\",\"SqsQueueArn\":\"string\"},\"MeetingFeatures\":{\"Audio\":{\"EchoReduction\":\"AVAILABLE\"}},\"PrimaryMeetingId\":\"string\",\"TenantIds\":[\"string\"],\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

api_call:
import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
  "content-type": "application/json"
]
let parameters = [
  "ClientRequestToken": "pa$$word",
  "MediaRegion": "string",
  "MeetingHostId": "pa$$word",
  "ExternalMeetingId": "pa$$word",
  "NotificationsConfiguration": [
    "LambdaFunctionArn": "string",
    "SnsTopicArn": "string",
    "SqsQueueArn": "string"
  ],
  "MeetingFeatures": ["Audio": ["EchoReduction": "AVAILABLE"]],
  "PrimaryMeetingId": "string",
  "TenantIds": ["string"],
  "Tags": [
    [
      "Key": "string",
      "Value": "string"
    ]
  ]
] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers
request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient();

MediaType mediaType = MediaType.parse("application/json");
RequestBody body = RequestBody.create(mediaType, "{\"ClientRequestToken\":\"pa$$word\",\"MediaRegion\":\"string\",\"MeetingHostId\":\"pa$$word\",\"ExternalMeetingId\":\"pa$$word\",\"MeetingFeatures\":{\"Audio\":{\"EchoReduction\":\"AVAILABLE\"}},\"NotificationsConfiguration\":{\"LambdaFunctionArn\":\"string\",\"SnsTopicArn\":\"string\",\"SqsQueueArn\":\"string\"},\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}],\"PrimaryMeetingId\":\"string\",\"TenantIds\":[\"string\"],\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}");
Request request = new Request.Builder()
  .url("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=create-attendees")
  .post(body)
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .addHeader("content-type", "application/json")
  .build();

Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

best_instruction.candidate: How do I create a new Amazon Chime SDK meeting in a specific media region and invite attendees using the Amazon Chime SDK Meetings API?

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

payload = "{\"ClientRequestToken\":\"pa$$word\",\"MediaRegion\":\"string\",\"MeetingHostId\":\"pa$$word\",\"ExternalMeetingId\":\"pa$$word\",\"MeetingFeatures\":{\"Audio\":{\"EchoReduction\":\"AVAILABLE\"}},\"NotificationsConfiguration\":{\"LambdaFunctionArn\":\"string\",\"SnsTopicArn\":\"string\",\"SqsQueueArn\":\"string\"},\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}],\"PrimaryMeetingId\":\"string\",\"TenantIds\":[\"string\"],\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}"

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

best_instruction.candidate: How do I create a new Amazon Chime SDK meeting in a specific media region and invite attendees using the Amazon Chime SDK Meetings API?

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=create-attendees"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"ClientRequestToken\":\"pa$$word\",\"MediaRegion\":\"string\",\"MeetingHostId\":\"pa$$word\",\"ExternalMeetingId\":\"pa$$word\",\"MeetingFeatures\":{\"Audio\":{\"EchoReduction\":\"AVAILABLE\"}},\"NotificationsConfiguration\":{\"LambdaFunctionArn\":\"string\",\"SnsTopicArn\":\"string\",\"SqsQueueArn\":\"string\"},\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}],\"PrimaryMeetingId\":\"string\",\"TenantIds\":[\"string\"],\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=create-attendees")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"ClientRequestToken\":\"pa$$word\",\"MediaRegion\":\"string\",\"MeetingHostId\":\"pa$$word\",\"ExternalMeetingId\":\"pa$$word\",\"MeetingFeatures\":{\"Audio\":{\"EchoReduction\":\"AVAILABLE\"}},\"NotificationsConfiguration\":{\"LambdaFunctionArn\":\"string\",\"SnsTopicArn\":\"string\",\"SqsQueueArn\":\"string\"},\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}],\"PrimaryMeetingId\":\"string\",\"TenantIds\":[\"string\"],\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"ClientRequestToken\":\"pa$$word\",\"MediaRegion\":\"string\",\"MeetingHostId\":\"pa$$word\",\"ExternalMeetingId\":\"pa$$word\",\"MeetingFeatures\":{\"Audio\":{\"EchoReduction\":\"AVAILABLE\"}},\"NotificationsConfiguration\":{\"LambdaFunctionArn\":\"string\",\"SnsTopicArn\":\"string\",\"SqsQueueArn\":\"string\"},\"Attendees\":[{\"ExternalUserId\":\"string\",\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}],\"PrimaryMeetingId\":\"string\",\"TenantIds\":[\"string\"],\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",

    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

api_call:
import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
  "content-type": "application/json"
]
let parameters = [
  "ClientRequestToken": "pa$$word",
  "MediaRegion": "string",
  "MeetingHostId": "pa$$word",
  "ExternalMeetingId": "pa$$word",
  "MeetingFeatures": ["Audio": ["EchoReduction": "AVAILABLE"]],
  "NotificationsConfiguration": [
    "LambdaFunctionArn": "string",
    "SnsTopicArn": "string",
    "SqsQueueArn": "string"
  ],
  "Attendees": [
    [
      "ExternalUserId": "string",
      "Capabilities": [
        "Audio": "SendReceive",
        "Video": "SendReceive",
        "Content": "SendReceive"
      ]
    ]
  ],
  "PrimaryMeetingId": "string",
  "TenantIds": ["string"],
  "Tags": [
    [
      "Key": "string",
      "Value": "string"
    ]
  ]
] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=create-attendees")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers
request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

api_call:
curl --request DELETE \
  --url http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE'
description: Deletes an attendee from the specified Amazon Chime SDK meeting and deletes their JoinToken. Attendees are automatically deleted when a Amazon Chime SDK meeting is deleted. api_description: The Amazon Chime SDK meetings APIs in this section allow software developers to create Amazon Chime SDK meetings, set the AWS Regions for meetings, create and manage users, and send and receive meeting notifications. For more information about the meeting APIs, see Amazon Chime SDK meetings.

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("DELETE", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "DELETE",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

api_call:
import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
]

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "DELETE"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("GET", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

best_instruction.candidate: How do I retrieve the details of a specific attendee for a given meeting ID using Amazon Chime SDK Meetings API?

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

best_instruction.candidate: How do I retrieve specific attendee details for a given meeting ID and attendee ID using the Amazon Chime SDK Meetings API?

api_call:
import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
]

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "GET"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("DELETE", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "DELETE",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

api_call:
import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
]

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "DELETE"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

  .build();

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

api_call:
import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
]

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "GET"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

  .build();

Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("GET", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?arn=SOME_STRING_VALUE", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"

    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",

]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);

  echo $response;

import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
]

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?arn=SOME_STRING_VALUE#arn")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "GET"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

  --url 'http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/transcription?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=start' \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"TranscriptionConfiguration":{"EngineTranscribeSettings":{"LanguageCode":"en-US","VocabularyFilterMethod":"remove","VocabularyFilterName":"string","VocabularyName":"string","Region":"us-east-2","EnablePartialResultsStabilization":true,"PartialResultsStability":"low","ContentIdentificationType":"PII","ContentRedactionType":"PII","PiiEntityTypes":"string","LanguageModelName":"string","IdentifyLanguage":true,"LanguageOptions":"string","PreferredLanguage":"en-US","VocabularyNames":"string","VocabularyFilterNames":"string"},"EngineTranscribeMedicalSettings":{"LanguageCode":"en-US","Specialty":"PRIMARYCARE","Type":"CONVERSATION","VocabularyName":"string","Region":"us-east-1","ContentIdentificationType":"PHI"}}}'

Starts transcription for the specified meetingId. For more information, refer to Using Amazon Chime SDK live transcription in the Amazon Chime SDK Developer Guide.

If you specify an invalid configuration, a TranscriptFailed event will be sent with the contents of the BadRequestException generated by Amazon Transcribe. For more information on each parameter and which combinations are valid, refer to the StartStreamTranscription API in the Amazon Transcribe Developer Guide.

Amazon Chime SDK live transcription is powered by Amazon Transcribe. Use of Amazon Transcribe is subject to the AWS Service Terms, including the terms specific to the AWS Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence Services.

best_instruction.candidate: Please give me an example of how to start transcription for a given Amazon Chime SDK meeting using the StartMeetingTranscription endpoint from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings.

api_call:
OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient();

MediaType mediaType = MediaType.parse("application/json");
RequestBody body = RequestBody.create(mediaType, "{\"TranscriptionConfiguration\":{\"EngineTranscribeSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyFilterMethod\":\"remove\",\"VocabularyFilterName\":\"string\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-2\",\"EnablePartialResultsStabilization\":true,\"PartialResultsStability\":\"low\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PII\",\"ContentRedactionType\":\"PII\",\"PiiEntityTypes\":\"string\",\"LanguageModelName\":\"string\",\"IdentifyLanguage\":true,\"LanguageOptions\":\"string\",\"PreferredLanguage\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyNames\":\"string\",\"VocabularyFilterNames\":\"string\"},\"EngineTranscribeMedicalSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"Specialty\":\"PRIMARYCARE\",\"Type\":\"CONVERSATION\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-1\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PHI\"}}}");
Request request = new Request.Builder()
  .url("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/transcription?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=start")
  .post(body)
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .addHeader("content-type", "application/json")
  .build();

Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

best_instruction.candidate: Please give me an example of how to start transcription for a given meeting ID using the endpoint StartMeetingTranscription from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings.

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

payload = "{\"TranscriptionConfiguration\":{\"EngineTranscribeSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyFilterMethod\":\"remove\",\"VocabularyFilterName\":\"string\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-2\",\"EnablePartialResultsStabilization\":true,\"PartialResultsStability\":\"low\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PII\",\"ContentRedactionType\":\"PII\",\"PiiEntityTypes\":\"string\",\"LanguageModelName\":\"string\",\"IdentifyLanguage\":true,\"LanguageOptions\":\"string\",\"PreferredLanguage\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyNames\":\"string\",\"VocabularyFilterNames\":\"string\"},\"EngineTranscribeMedicalSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"Specialty\":\"PRIMARYCARE\",\"Type\":\"CONVERSATION\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-1\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PHI\"}}}"

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/transcription?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))
description:

If you specify an invalid configuration, a TranscriptFailed event will be sent with the contents of the BadRequestException generated by Amazon Transcribe. api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/transcription?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=start"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"TranscriptionConfiguration\":{\"EngineTranscribeSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyFilterMethod\":\"remove\",\"VocabularyFilterName\":\"string\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-2\",\"EnablePartialResultsStabilization\":true,\"PartialResultsStability\":\"low\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PII\",\"ContentRedactionType\":\"PII\",\"PiiEntityTypes\":\"string\",\"LanguageModelName\":\"string\",\"IdentifyLanguage\":true,\"LanguageOptions\":\"string\",\"PreferredLanguage\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyNames\":\"string\",\"VocabularyFilterNames\":\"string\"},\"EngineTranscribeMedicalSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"Specialty\":\"PRIMARYCARE\",\"Type\":\"CONVERSATION\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-1\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PHI\"}}}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/transcription?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=start")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"TranscriptionConfiguration\":{\"EngineTranscribeSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyFilterMethod\":\"remove\",\"VocabularyFilterName\":\"string\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-2\",\"EnablePartialResultsStabilization\":true,\"PartialResultsStability\":\"low\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PII\",\"ContentRedactionType\":\"PII\",\"PiiEntityTypes\":\"string\",\"LanguageModelName\":\"string\",\"IdentifyLanguage\":true,\"LanguageOptions\":\"string\",\"PreferredLanguage\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyNames\":\"string\",\"VocabularyFilterNames\":\"string\"},\"EngineTranscribeMedicalSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"Specialty\":\"PRIMARYCARE\",\"Type\":\"CONVERSATION\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-1\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PHI\"}}}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

best_instruction.candidate: Please give me an example of how to start transcription for a specific meeting ID using the endpoint StartMeetingTranscription from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings.

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/transcription?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=start",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"TranscriptionConfiguration\":{\"EngineTranscribeSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyFilterMethod\":\"remove\",\"VocabularyFilterName\":\"string\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-2\",\"EnablePartialResultsStabilization\":true,\"PartialResultsStability\":\"low\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PII\",\"ContentRedactionType\":\"PII\",\"PiiEntityTypes\":\"string\",\"LanguageModelName\":\"string\",\"IdentifyLanguage\":true,\"LanguageOptions\":\"string\",\"PreferredLanguage\":\"en-US\",\"VocabularyNames\":\"string\",\"VocabularyFilterNames\":\"string\"},\"EngineTranscribeMedicalSettings\":{\"LanguageCode\":\"en-US\",\"Specialty\":\"PRIMARYCARE\",\"Type\":\"CONVERSATION\",\"VocabularyName\":\"string\",\"Region\":\"us-east-1\",\"ContentIdentificationType\":\"PHI\"}}}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}
description:
Starts transcription for the specified meetingId. For more information, refer to Using Amazon Chime SDK live transcription in the Amazon Chime SDK Developer Guide.

If you specify an invalid configuration, a TranscriptFailed event will be sent with the contents of the BadRequestException generated by Amazon Transcribe. For more information on each parameter and which combinations are valid, refer to the StartStreamTranscription API in the Amazon Transcribe Developer Guide.

Amazon Chime SDK live transcription is powered by Amazon Transcribe. Use of Amazon Transcribe is subject to the AWS Service Terms, including the terms specific to the AWS Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence Services.

import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
  "content-type": "application/json"
]
let parameters = ["TranscriptionConfiguration": [
    "EngineTranscribeSettings": [
      "LanguageCode": "en-US",

best_instruction.candidate: Please give me an example of how to stop transcription for a specific meeting using the Amazon Chime SDK Meetings API. Provide the `meetingId` for the meeting whose transcription you want to stop.

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("POST", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/transcription?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/transcription?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=stop"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/transcription?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=stop",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,

request.httpMethod = "POST"
