import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

payload = "{\"ResourceARN\":\"string\",\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}"

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=tag-resource"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"ResourceARN\":\"string\",\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=tag-resource")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"ResourceARN\":\"string\",\"Tags\":[{\"Key\":\"string\",\"Value\":\"string\"}]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
  "content-type": "application/json"
]
let parameters = [
  "ResourceARN": "string",
  "Tags": [
    [
      "Key": "string",
      "Value": "string"
    ]
  ]
] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=tag-resource")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers
request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

description:
Removes the specified tags from the specified resources. When you specify a tag key, the action removes both that key and its associated value. The operation succeeds even if you attempt to remove tags from a resource that were already removed. Note the following:

  • To remove tags from a resource, you need the necessary permissions for the service that the resource belongs to as well as permissions for removing tags. For more information, see the documentation for the service whose resource you want to untag.

  • You can only tag resources that are located in the specified AWS Region for the calling AWS account.

Minimum permissions

In addition to the tag:UntagResources permission required by this operation, you must also have the remove tags permission defined by the service that created the resource. For example, to remove the tags from an Amazon EC2 instance using the UntagResources operation, you must have both of the following permissions:

tag:UntagResource

ChimeSDKMeetings:DeleteTags

  .url("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=untag-resource")

  .addHeader("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .addHeader("content-type", "application/json")
  .build();

Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

Removes the specified tags from the specified resources. When you specify a tag key, the action removes both that key and its associated value. The operation succeeds even if you attempt to remove tags from a resource that were already removed. Note the following:

  • To remove tags from a resource, you need the necessary permissions for the service that the resource belongs to as well as permissions for removing tags. For more information, see the documentation for the service whose resource you want to untag.

  • You can only tag resources that are located in the specified AWS Region for the calling AWS account.

Minimum permissions

In addition to the tag:UntagResources permission required by this operation, you must also have the remove tags permission defined by the service that created the resource. For example, to remove the tags from an Amazon EC2 instance using the UntagResources operation, you must have both of the following permissions:

tag:UntagResource

best_instruction.candidate: Please give an example of how to remove specific tags from a resource using the endpoint UntagResource in Amazon Chime SDK Meetings. Make sure you have the required permissions for the service that manages the resource and for removing tags.

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

payload = "{\"ResourceARN\":\"string\",\"TagKeys\":[\"string\"]}"

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

best_instruction.candidate: Please give me an example of how to remove specific tags from resources using the endpoint UntagResource from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings.

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=untag-resource"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"ResourceARN\":\"string\",\"TagKeys\":[\"string\"]}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=untag-resource")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"ResourceARN\":\"string\",\"TagKeys\":[\"string\"]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

api_call:
import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
  "content-type": "application/json"
]
let parameters = [
  "ResourceARN": "string",
  "TagKeys": ["string"]
] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/tags?operation=SOME_STRING_VALUE#operation=untag-resource")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers
request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()

api_call:
curl --request PUT \
  --url http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D/capabilities \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"Capabilities":{"Audio":"SendReceive","Video":"SendReceive","Content":"SendReceive"}}'
description:
The capabilities that you want to update.

You use the capabilities with a set of values that control what the capabilities can do, such as SendReceive data. For more information about those values, see .

When using capabilities, be aware of these corner cases:

  • You can't set content capabilities to SendReceive or Receive unless you also set video capabilities to SendReceive or Receive. If you don't set the video capability to receive, the response will contain an HTTP 400 Bad Request status code. However, you can set your video capability to receive and you set your content capability to not receive.

  • When you change an audio capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee left their microphone unmuted, audio will flow from the attendee to the other meeting participants.

  • When you change a video or content capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee turned on their video or content streams, remote attendees can receive those streams, but only after media renegotiation between the client and the Amazon Chime back-end server.
api_description: The Amazon Chime SDK meetings APIs in this section allow software developers to create Amazon Chime SDK meetings, set the AWS Regions for meetings, create and manage users, and send and receive meeting notifications. For more information about the meeting APIs, see Amazon Chime SDK meetings.

api_call:
OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient();

MediaType mediaType = MediaType.parse("application/json");
RequestBody body = RequestBody.create(mediaType, "{\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}");
Request request = new Request.Builder()
  .url("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D/capabilities")
  .put(body)
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .addHeader("content-type", "application/json")
  .build();

Response response = client.newCall(request).execute();

In addition, you will be given the endpoint's identifier, the endpoint's functionality, the endpoint's description, and the name of the API this endpoint belongs to. Your job is to re-generate the endpoint's identifier, functionality, description, and API name based on the given user query input. Below are some examples: ###Input: Please give me an example of how to use the endpoint CreateMeeting from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings. ###Output: Functionality: Description: Creates a new Amazon Chime SDK meeting in the specified media Region with no initial attendees. For more information about specifying media Regions, see Amazon Chime SDK Media Regions in the Amazon Chime Developer Guide. For more information about the Amazon Chime SDK, see Using the Amazon Chime SDK in the Amazon Chime Developer Guide. Endpoint: CreateMeeting API: Amazon Chime SDK Meetings ###Input: I need to creates up to 100 attendees for an active amazon chime sdk meeting with the Amazon Chime SDK Meetings. Please help me with that. ###Output: Functionality: Description: Creates up to 100 attendees for an active Amazon Chime SDK meeting. For more information about the Amazon Chime SDK, see Using the Amazon Chime SDK in the Amazon Chime Developer Guide. Endpoint: BatchCreateAttendee API: Amazon Chime SDK Meetings ###Input: Please give me an example of how to use the endpoint BatchCreateAttendee from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings. ###Output: Functionality: Description: Creates up to 100 attendees for an active Amazon Chime SDK meeting. For more information about the Amazon Chime SDK, see Using the Amazon Chime SDK in the Amazon Chime Developer Guide. Endpoint: BatchCreateAttendee API: Amazon Chime SDK Meetings Here is the actual task for you: ###Input: Please give me an example of how to use the endpoint UpdateAttendeeCapabilities from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings to update an attendee's capabilities, such as audio and video, in an ongoing meeting. ###Output: Functionality: Description:

The capabilities that you want to update.

You use the capabilities with a set of values that control what the capabilities can do, such as SendReceive data. For more information about those values, see .

When using capabilities, be aware of these corner cases:

  • You can't set content capabilities to SendReceive or Receive unless you also set video capabilities to SendReceive or Receive. If you don't set the video capability to receive, the response will contain an HTTP 400 Bad Request status code. However, you can set your video capability to receive and you set your content capability to not receive.

  • When you change an audio capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee left their microphone unmuted, audio will flow from the attendee to the other meeting participants.

  • When you change a video or content capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee turned on their video or content streams, remote attendees can receive those streams, but only after media renegotiation between the client and the Amazon Chime back-end server.

Endpoint: UpdateAttendeeCapabilities API: Amazon Chime SDK Meetings

best_instruction.candidate: Please give me an example of how to use the endpoint UpdateAttendeeCapabilities from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings to modify an attendee's capabilities for audio and video streams in a running meeting.

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("meetings-chime.")

payload = "{\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}"

headers = {
    'X-Amz-Content-Sha256': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Date': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Algorithm': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Credential': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Security-Token': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-Signature': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'X-Amz-SignedHeaders': "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PUT", "%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D/capabilities", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))
description:
The capabilities that you want to update.

You use the capabilities with a set of values that control what the capabilities can do, such as SendReceive data. For more information about those values, see .

When using capabilities, be aware of these corner cases:

  • You can't set content capabilities to SendReceive or Receive unless you also set video capabilities to SendReceive or Receive. If you don't set the video capability to receive, the response will contain an HTTP 400 Bad Request status code. However, you can set your video capability to receive and you set your content capability to not receive.

  • When you change an audio capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee left their microphone unmuted, audio will flow from the attendee to the other meeting participants.

  • When you change a video or content capability from None or Receive to Send or SendReceive , and if the attendee turned on their video or content streams, remote attendees can receive those streams, but only after media renegotiation between the client and the Amazon Chime back-end server.
api_description: The Amazon Chime SDK meetings APIs in this section allow software developers to create Amazon Chime SDK meetings, set the AWS Regions for meetings, create and manage users, and send and receive meeting notifications. For more information about the meeting APIs, see Amazon Chime SDK meetings.

best_instruction.candidate: Please give me an example of how to use the endpoint UpdateAttendeeCapabilities from Amazon Chime SDK Meetings to update the capabilities of an attendee, such as audio and video. Remember to consider the corner cases mentioned in the documentation.

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D/capabilities"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("PUT", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Content-Sha256", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Date", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Algorithm", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Credential", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Security-Token", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-Signature", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("X-Amz-SignedHeaders", "SOME_STRING_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D/capabilities")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Put.new(url)
request["X-Amz-Content-Sha256"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Date"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Algorithm"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Credential"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Security-Token"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-Signature"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["X-Amz-SignedHeaders"] = 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D/capabilities",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"Capabilities\":{\"Audio\":\"SendReceive\",\"Video\":\"SendReceive\",\"Content\":\"SendReceive\"}}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Algorithm: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Content-Sha256: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Credential: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Date: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Security-Token: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-Signature: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "X-Amz-SignedHeaders: SOME_STRING_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

api_call:
import Foundation

let headers = [
  "X-Amz-Content-Sha256": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Date": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Algorithm": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Credential": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Security-Token": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-Signature": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "X-Amz-SignedHeaders": "SOME_STRING_VALUE",
  "Authorization": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
  "content-type": "application/json"
]
let parameters = ["Capabilities": [
    "Audio": "SendReceive",
    "Video": "SendReceive",
    "Content": "SendReceive"
  ]] as [String : Any]

let postData = JSONSerialization.data(withJSONObject: parameters, options: [])

let request = NSMutableURLRequest(url: NSURL(string: "http://meetings-chime./%7Bregion%7D.amazonaws.com/meetings/%7BMeetingId%7D/attendees/%7BAttendeeId%7D/capabilities")! as URL,
                                        cachePolicy: .useProtocolCachePolicy,
                                    timeoutInterval: 10.0)
request.httpMethod = "PUT"
request.allHTTPHeaderFields = headers
request.httpBody = postData as Data

let session = URLSession.shared
let dataTask = session.dataTask(with: request as URLRequest, completionHandler: { (data, response, error) -> Void in
  if (error != nil) {
    print(error)
  } else {
    let httpResponse = response as? HTTPURLResponse
    print(httpResponse)
  }
})

dataTask.resume()
